name: Safari Bubble Pop 2
description:
Safari Bubble Pop 2 for free and go on a wild adventure at the savanna. Travel across some exotic settings, explore over 1300 amazing levels filled with fun puzzles and challenges and collect beetles to win levels!
Game Features:
- Ancient style graphics and designs
- Thousands of awesome level to explore
- Addictive gameplay
- Hours of entertainment
- Fun boosters and surprises
